title: The growth hackers come to your town
description: Local news is a tough racket. When I tried to buy a newspaper this year, my friends in the industry feared for my sanity. Even Perplexity cautioned me that it was a high-risk, low-reward investment. Then why is there a gold rush of independent local newsletters flooding the market? I talked to a few entrepreneurs...
